title: Dimitri Kudinov
text: Dimitri Vasilyevich Kudinov (; born 8 February 1963 in <a href="Tbilisi">Tbilisi</a>) is a retired <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgian</a> professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a>er. He made his professional debut in the <a href="Soviet%20Top%20League">Soviet Top League</a> in 1982 for <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Tbilisi">FC Dinamo Tbilisi</a>.
